description: Family owned & Operated by: Andarrio Johnson & Anglee Brown (1st cousins).  Cuzzo's Cuisine is a Gourmet Food Truck specializing in Southern Cuisines. Chef Andarrio Johnson, graduate of Johnson & Wales University Charleston, SC. We offer a Variety of Southern Dishes. Menu: Lobster Mac & Cheese, Shrimp & Grits, Flavored Wings, Soft Fish Tacos(Tilapia), Fish(Tilapia) & Grits, Flavored Wings, Seasoned Fries, Chicken & Red Velvet Waffle, Shrimp & Fries, Jerk Shrimp & Fries & much more.  Cuzzo's Cuisine is the perfect place to grab a bite on your walk to work, on your break from school, or while just wondering the streets of Charlotte.Come let your taste buds explore our awesome flavors. Our motto is to provide excellent customer service!  ThanksCuzzo's Cuisine  "Where everyone's Family"
name: Cuzzo's Cuisine
